envRaster 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

add_raster_cell()

Add cell to df with lat/long

fix_index()

Summarise and fix common problems with raster indices

geomorph_ras()

Title Landform Classification after Jasiewicz and Stepinkski (2013)

get_env_data()

Get raster values for each unique location in a data frame.

get_ftp_files()

Download ftp files

land_class()

Title R function for landform classification on the basis on Topographic Position Index

make_env() make_env()

Create dataframe of 'cells' and their associated env data

make_env_indices()

Make NDVI, SAVI, NDMI and NBR2

make_raster_index()

Make raster indices

msavi()

Calculate modified soil adjusted vegetation index (MSAVI).

nbr2()

Calculate normalised burn ratio 2 (NBR2).

ndmi()

Calculate normalised difference moisture index (NDMI).

ndvi()

Calculate normalised difference vegetation index (NDVI).

parse_auscover()

Parse an AusCover file name.

parse_env_tif()

Parse tif saved using raster file naming convention among env packages.

prep_auscover()

Generate lists of paths in preparation for summarise_rast_paths().

savi()

Calculate soil adjusted vegetation index (SAVI).

search_ftp_files()

Search for files on an ftp site

summarise_env()

Environmental summary statistics

summarise_rast_paths()

Summarise raster files

test_intersection()

Test for intersection of two rasters

widen_env_data()

Widen env data, especially AusCover data from get_env_data.
